review: Amazing little device! Technology is surprising now-a-days!It works as shown on the commercials, and if you haven't seen any, basically you plug the Chromecast to a smart TV (it has to be plugged into an outlet in order to work) then download the application to your phone and/or tablet and start streaming! The image is flawless and plays perfectly. You just control it from the device you decide to use.The only bad thing is that if you wanted to stream from a Laptop/Computer you'd need to download google chrome and then the chromecast add-on. And even still, the videos don't load well and they get stuck.Other than that I haven't had any issues with it! Recommended!
